page.title: 07Family Life - meals
page.content: For breakfast we have a choice of fruit juice, cereal and toast with marmalade. The juice could be orange, grapefruit, apple, pear, pinapple or a mixture of all of them. The cereal could be chocolate,honey or sugar coated. It might even be a mixture of nuts and dried fruit. For lunch we have meat - chicken,pork,beef,lamb or turkey all with potatoes and vegetables. We might have something sweet for dessert. For tea we have fried bacon,eggs and sausages,or fish and chips with tomatoe sauce and a cup of hot chocolate or tea. If we like, we can have a salad of cold meat with lettuce,tomatoes,eggs(hard-boiled) and cucumber often with salad dressing. We often have bread, butter and jam with our meals as well.
